channel.title: Help with debate
channel.description: hi im doing a debate at school and the topic is 'should advertisement aimed at children be banned'it would help if i hade something to back up my evidence im the negative team [b]THAT DOESNT MEAN YOU HAVE TO VOTE NO[/b] vote what you think but it would look a bit odd if 100% voted no so please vote and leave a post of why you think it should/shouldnt be banned (info on both sides would help because that way we will be ready for what the other team will say) thanks ;)

item.title: Help with debate
item.dc:creator: @killerman93 killerman93
item.description:
@killerman93 wrote:

No, if there werent any, there would be too many ads for alchol compelling kids to want it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with debate
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I choose no because it is an adults choice as to what their child buys, its not as if a child sees an ad for action man and then runs to the store to get one. Sure ads may influence a child to buy something but only under their parents supervision (which should be adequete(sp) enough to know when and when not buying something is a good idea).

Blame the parents biatches.

Read full topic

item.description:

3.65 kilos:

What kind of advertisements? I mean, toys and stuff are okay but cigarettes and the like should not be advertised toward young people.

they banned advertising cigarettes everywhere didnt they?

but yeah .
